original_definition: 'freezer' means a freezer in which the compartment(s) is accessible from the top of the appliance or which has both top-opening type and upright type compartments but where the gross volume of the top-opening type compartment(s) exceeds 75 % of the total gross volume of the appliance, used for the storage of foodstuffs in non-household environments;
generated_definition: 'freezer' means a device used for storing food or other items at very low temperatures, typically below -18°c.

Article 2: ‘freezer’ means a refrigerating appliance with only 4-star compartments;
Not Article: Chest freezers, including professional chest freezers, should be in the scope of this Regulation, as they are out of the scope of the Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/1094 (6) and can be used in other environments than professional environments.
